### ğŸŒ† Before the sun rises, the world is quiet â€” and focus comes naturally.

â€” pre-dawn citylight focus synthwave

### Phase 1 â€” Pre-Dawn Quiet
(Ambient foundation, minimal rhythm, tonal establishment)
- [ ] 1. sustained analog pad chords with slow attack and long release, low-pass filtered, cool tonal balance, no percussion, stable harmonic center â€” pre-dawn citylight focus synthwave
- [ ] 2. layered vaporwave pads with gentle detune, slow harmonic movement over long phrases, faint tape noise texture, no rhythmic pulse â€” pre-dawn citylight focus synthwave
- [ ] 3. warm midrange pad layers with subtle analog drift, light reverb tail, minimal tonal motion, quiet ambient foundation â€” pre-dawn citylight focus synthwave
- [ ] 4. teal-leaning synth pad stack with smooth envelope shaping, soft noise bed, restrained harmonic changes, no drums â€” pre-dawn citylight focus synthwave
### Phase 2 â€” Early Focus Flow
(Rhythmic entry, consistent groove, focus-safe)
- [ ] 5. muted lo-fi drum machine groove, soft kick and hat, analog bass playing sustained root notes, pad chords carrying harmony â€” pre-dawn citylight focus synthwave
- [ ] 6. steady low-velocity drum pattern, restrained rhythmic density, warm analog bass, minimal chord variation, stable loop structure â€” pre-dawn citylight focus synthwave
- [ ] 7. smooth synth chord progression with consistent rhythmic support, controlled dynamics, no lead melody emphasis â€” pre-dawn citylight focus synthwave
- [ ] 8. retrowave-influenced pad harmony with gentle rhythmic pulse, softened drum transients, balanced midrange focus â€” pre-dawn citylight focus synthwave
### Phase 3 â€” Blue-Hour Momentum
(Peak clarity, controlled energy, still calm)
- [ ] 9. clean synthwave rhythm with restrained drum machine pattern, analog bass following chord roots, pads shifting harmony gradually â€” pre-dawn citylight focus synthwave
- [ ] 10. mid-energy focus groove, layered pads with slow filter movement, stable rhythmic foundation, controlled harmonic lift â€” pre-dawn citylight focus synthwave
- [ ] 11. chord-driven synthwave texture, airy pad layers, muted percussion, steady forward motion without lead emphasis â€” pre-dawn citylight focus synthwave
### Phase 4 â€” Citylight Fade
(Energy release, return to ambient, long tails)
- [ ] 12. sustained pad chords with gradually reduced rhythmic presence, softened percussion density, extended reverb decay â€” pre-dawn citylight focus synthwave
- [ ] 13. ambient pad layers with slow harmonic drift, subtle noise floor, low-end warmth, minimal rhythmic motion â€” pre-dawn citylight focus synthwave
